attributes.action: Establish Bletchley as its own parliamentary constituency
attributes.additional_details: The people of Bletchley have little in common with those in Buckingham. The Government should redraw the constituency borders to allow the people of both respective areas to be better represented.
attributes.background: Separate the current constituency of Buckingham and Bletchley into two distinct constituencies

rejection.details:
The issue raised by the petition is the responsibility of the Boundary Commission for England. 

Find out more: https://boundarycommissionforengland.independent.gov.uk/
